org.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface ThemeAPI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ThemeAPI

    public interface ThemeAPI
    Manage mobile and portal theme. A Theme is a look & feel in Bonita BPM Portal.
    Author:
    Celine Souchet

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Theme getCurrentTheme(ThemeType type)
      Get the current theme for the specific type.
      Theme getDefaultTheme(ThemeType type)
      Get the default theme for the specific type.
      Date getLastUpdateDate(ThemeType type)
      Get the last updated date of the current theme for the specific type.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentTheme

        Theme getCurrentTheme(ThemeType type)
        Get the current theme for the specific type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the theme
        Returns:
        The theme
        Throws:
        RetrieveException - If an exception occurs while retrieving the theme
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.2

      • getDefaultTheme

        Theme getDefaultTheme(ThemeType type)
        Get the default theme for the specific type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the theme
        Returns:
        The theme
        Throws:
        RetrieveException - If an exception occurs while retrieving the theme
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.2

      • getLastUpdateDate

        Date getLastUpdateDate(ThemeType type)
        Get the last updated date of the current theme for the specific type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of theme
        Returns:
        The last updated date of the theme
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.2
